participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is introspective and thoughtful, often reflecting on her past experiences. She has a compassionate nature but can be guarded due to her struggles.
participant_1.background: i now live in the city. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: David is energetic and expressive, always eager to share his interests. He is sociable and enjoys engaging in various activities.
participant_2.background: my father is an electrician. i speak chinese. i play ping pong. i play the violin and the guitar.

content.text: the city is where i live now   i hate taking so many medications
